articles.title: AI and physics combine to reveal the 3D structure of a flare erupting around a black hole - Nanowerk
articles.description: Based on radio telescope data and models of black hole physics, scientists used neural networks to reconstruct a 3D image that shows how explosive flare-ups in the disk of gas around our supermassive black hole might look.

articles.title: Mars Helicopter Ingenuity Spots Perseverance Rover During Flight 51 - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
